title: President Donald J. Trump’s Tax Cuts are a Windfall for Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
March 14, 2018
At the heart of our plan is tremendous relief for working families and for small businesses.
						President Donald J. Trump					TAX CUTS COME HOME: President Trump’s tax cuts have brought real, tangible benefits to American families and businesses.UNBURDENING BUSINESS: The new tax cuts dramatically lower the tax burden on American business, unleashing a new era of economic growth and making the U.S. more competitive.BOOSTING PAYCHECKS: President Trump’s tax cuts are already boosting paychecks of workers across the country.
